snippet: The British pound surged after the Bank of England surprised investors and held off cutting interest rates....
abstract: Stocks continue into record territory on early positive bank reports.
lead_paragraph: The British pound surged after the Bank of England surprised investors and held off cutting interest rates.

headline.main: Wall St. Rises, Helped by Bank Stocks
headline.print_headline: U.S. Investors’ Spirits Rise With Early Bank Reports
